section.title: Configurable service restart thresholds
section.p: (CC-4100) Restart thresholds are available to manage services. In the browser interface, you can edit the service to specify a value in the new field Restart when memory usage exceeds % of requested RAM. When your threshold is reached, the service restarts automatically.
For more information about how this feature can be used, refer to the 6.2.0 release notes.
